weaponWarrior1Notes: Common soldier's blade. Increases Strength by <%= str %>.
weaponWarrior2Notes: Double-bitted battle-axe. Increases Strength by <%= str %>
weaponWarrior3Notes: Heavy club with brutal spikes. Increases Strength by <%= str %>.
weaponWarrior4Notes: Sword whose edge bites like th' north wind. Increases Strength by <%= str %>.
weaponWarrior5Notes: Weapon whose forge-glow never fades. Increases Strength by <%= str %>.
weaponWarrior6Notes: Bane 'o creatures 'o darkness. Increases Strength by <%= str %>.
weaponRogue0Notes: A scallywag's most basic weapon. Confers no benefit.
weaponRogue1Notes: Light, concealable blade. Increases Strength by <%= str %>.
weaponRogue2Notes: Slashin' sword, swift to deliver a killin' blow. Increases Strength by <%= str %>.
weaponRogue3Notes: Distinctive bush knife, both survival device 'n weapon. Increases Strength by <%= str %>.
weaponRogue4Notes: Heavy batons whirled 'bout on a length 'o chain. Increases Strength by <%= str %>.
weaponRogue5Notes: Sleek 'n deadly as th' ninja themselves. Increases Strength by <%= str %>.
weaponRogue6Notes: Complex weapon adept at ensnarin' 'n disarmin' opponents. Increases Strength by <%= str %>.
weaponWizard1Notes: Basic implement 'o carven wood. Increases Intelligence by <%= int %> 'n Perception by <%= per %>.
weaponWizard2Notes: Focuses power through a precious stone. Increases Intelligence by <%= int %> 'n Perception by <%= per %>.
weaponWizard3Notes: Plated in metal to channel heat, cold, 'n lightnin'. Increases Intelligence by <%= int %> 'n Perception by <%= per %>.
weaponWizard4Notes: As powerful as it be heavy. Increases Intelligence by <%= int %> 'n Perception by <%= per %>.
weaponWizard5Notes: Assists in weavin' th' most complex 'o spells. Increases Intelligence by <%= int %> 'n Perception by <%= per %>.
weaponWizard6Notes: Fashioned 'o orichalcum, th' alchemic gold, mighty 'n rare. Increases Intelligence by <%= int %> 'n Perception by <%= per %>.
weaponHealer0Notes: Fer docs in learnin'. Confers no benefit.
weaponHealer1Notes: Crafted durin' a doc's initiation. Increases Intelligence by <%= int %>.
weaponHealer2Notes: Topped wit' a gem bearin' curative properties. Increases Intelligence by <%= int %>.
weaponHealer3Notes: Purifies poison at a touch. Increases Intelligence by <%= int %>.
weaponHealer4Notes: As much a badge 'o office as a healin' device. Increases Intelligence by <%= int %>.
weaponHealer5Notes: Fit to grace th' hand 'o a monarch, or 'o one who stands at a monarch's right hand. Increases Intelligence by <%= int %>.
weaponHealer6Notes: Soothes th' pain 'o all who look upon it. Increases Intelligence by <%= int %>.
weaponSpecial0Notes: Feasts upon foes' life essence to power its wicked strokes. Increases Strength by <%= str %>.
weaponSpecial1Notes: Its glitterin' facets be tellin' th' tale 'o a pirate. Increases all attributes by <%= attrs %>.
weaponSpecial2Text: Stephen Weber's Shaft o' th' Dragon
weaponSpecial2Notes: Feel th' potency 'o th' dragon surge from within! Increases Strength 'n Perception by <%= attrs %> each.
weaponSpecial3Notes: Meetin's, monsters, malaise: managed! Mash! Increases Strength, Intelligence, 'n Constitution by <%= attrs %> each.
weaponSpecialCriticalNotes: 'tis champion slew a critical Github foe whar many warriors fell. Fashioned from th' bones 'o Bug, 'tis hammer deals a mighty critical hit. Increases Strength 'n Perception by <%= attrs %> each.
weaponSpecialYetiNotes: Limited Edition 2013 Winter Gear! 'tis spear allows its user to command any yeti. Increases Strength by <%= str %>.
weaponSpecialSkiNotes: Limited Edition 2013 Winter Gear! A weapon capable 'o destroyin' hordes 'o enemies! It also helps th' user make extra nice parallel turns. Increases Strength by <%= str %>.
weaponSpecialCandycaneNotes: Limited Edition 2013 Winter Gear! A powerful magician's staff. Powerfully DELICIOUS, we mean! a pair-handed weapon. Increases Intelligence by <%= int %> 'n Perception by <%= per %>.
weaponSpecialSnowflakeNotes: Limited Edition 2013 Winter Gear! 'tis wand sparkles wit' unlimited healin' power. Increases Intelligence by <%= int %>.
weaponSpecialSpringRogueNotes: Great for scaling tall buildings, and also for shredding carpets. Adds <%= str %> points to Strength. Limited Edition 2014 Spring Gear.
weaponSpecialSpringWarriorNotes: 'tis mighty sword can slice foes wit' ease! It also makes a delicious mid-battle snack. Adds <%= str %> points to Strength. Limited Edition 2014 Sprin' Gear.
weaponSpecialSpringMageNotes: Only th' most powerful rodents can brave their hunger to wield 'tis potent staff. Adds <%= int %> points to Intelligence 'n <%= per %> points to Perception. Limited Edition 2014 Sprin' Gear.
weaponSpecialSpringHealerNotes: FETCH! Adds <%= int %> points to Intelligence. Limited Edition 2014 Sprin' Gear.
weaponSpecialSummerRogueNotes: Avast! ye'll make them Dailies swim th' plank! Adds <%= str %> points to Strength. Limited Edition 2014 Summer Gear.
weaponSpecialSummerWarriorNotes: Thar isn't a task in any To-Do list willin' to tangle wit' 'tis gnarly knife! Adds <%= str %> points to Strength. Limited Edition 2014 Summer Gear.
weaponSpecialSummerMageNotes: 'tis trident be used to spear seaweed effectively, fer extra-productive kelp harvestin'! Adds <%= int %> points to Intelligence 'n <%= per %> points to Perception. Limited Edition 2014 Summer Gear.
weaponSpecialSummerHealerNotes: 'tis wand, made 'o aquamarine 'n live coral, be extra comely to schools 'o fish. Adds <%= int %> points to Intelligence. Limited Edition 2014 Summer Gear.
weaponSpecialFallRogueNotes: Dispatches undead. Also grants a bonus against werewolves, because ye can never be too careful. Adds <%= str %> points to Strength. Limited Edition 2014 Autumn Gear.
weaponSpecialFallWarriorNotes: 'tis grabby claw be at th' extra cuttin' edge 'o machines. Adds <%= str %> points to Strength. Limited Edition 2014 Autumn Gear.
weaponSpecialFallMageNotes: 'tis enchanted broom flies faster than a dragon! Adds <%= int %> points to Intelligence 'n <%= per %> points to Perception. Limited Edition 2014 Autumn Gear.
weaponSpecialFallHealerNotes: Th' scarab on 'tis wand protects 'n heals its wielder. Adds <%= int %> points to Intelligence. Limited Edition 2014 Autumn Gear.
armorWarrior1Notes: Jerkin 'o sturdy boiled hide. Increases Constitution by <%= con %>.
armorWarrior2Notes: Armor 'o interlocked metal rin's. Increases Constitution by <%= con %>.
armorWarrior3Notes: Suit 'o all-encasin' steel, th' pride 'o knights. Increases Constitution by <%= con %>.
armorWarrior4Notes: Heavy plate glowin' wit' defensive enchantments. Increases Constitution by <%= con %>.
armorWarrior5Notes: Looks ceremonial, but no known blade can pierce it. Increases Constitution by <%= con %>.
armorRogue1Notes: Leather armor treated to reduce noise. Increases Perception by <%= per %>.
armorRogue2Notes: Colored wit' dark dye to blend into shadows. Increases Perception by <%= per %>.
armorRogue3Notes: Equally discreet in dungeon or wilderness. Increases Perception by <%= per %>.
armorRogue4Notes: Wraps th' wearer in a veil 'o twilight. Increases Perception by <%= per %>.
armorRogue5Notes: Allows stealth in th' open in broad daylight. Increases Perception by <%= per %>.
armorWizard1Notes: Hedge-mage's outfit. Increases Intelligence by <%= int %>.
armorWizard2Notes: Clothes fer a wanderin' wonder-worker. Increases Intelligence by <%= int %>.
armorWizard3Notes: Denotes initiation into elite secrets. Increases Intelligence by <%= int %>.
armorWizard4Notes: Spirits 'n elementals bow before it. Increases Intelligence by <%= int %>.
armorWizard5Notes: Symbol 'o th' power behind th' throne. Increases Intelligence by <%= int %>.
armorHealer1Notes: Garment showin' humility 'n purpose. Increases Constitution by <%= con %>.
armorHealer2Notes: Worn by them dedicated to tendin' th' wounded in battle. Increases Constitution by <%= con %>.
armorHealer3Notes: Turns th' doc's own magics inward to fend off harm. Increases Constitution by <%= con %>.
armorHealer4Notes: Projects authority 'n dissipates curses. Increases Constitution by <%= con %>.
armorHealer5Notes: Attire 'o them who have saved th' lives 'o kin's. Increases Constitution by <%= con %>.
armorSpecial0Notes: Screams when struck, fer it feels pain in its wearer's place. Increases Constitution by <%= con %>.
armorSpecial1Notes: Its tireless power inures th' wearer to mundane discomfort. Increases all attributes by <%= attrs %>.
armorSpecial2Notes: Makes ye extra fluffy! Increases Constitution 'n Intelligence by <%= attrs %> each.
armorSpecialYetiNotes: Limited Edition 2013 Winter Gear! Fuzzy 'n fierce. Increases Constitution by <%= con %>.
armorSpecialSkiNotes: Limited Edition 2013 Winter Gear! Full 'o secret daggers 'n ski trail maps. Increases Perception by <%= per %>.
armorSpecialCandycaneNotes: Limited Edition 2013 Winter Gear! Spun from sugar 'n silk. Increases Intelligence by <%= int %>.
armorSpecialSnowflakeNotes: Limited Edition 2013 Winter Gear! A robe to keep ye warm, even in a blizzard. Increases Constitution by <%= con %>.
armorSpecialBirthdayNotes: As part 'o th' festivities, Absurd parrrty Robes be available free 'o charge in th' Item Store! Swath yourself in them silly garbs 'n don ye matchin' hats to celebrate 'tis momentous day.
armorSpecialGaymerxNotes: (Confers no benefit) In celebration 'o pride season 'n GaymerX, 'tis special armor be decorated wit' a radiant, colorful rainbow pattern! GaymerX be a game convention celebratin' LGBTQ 'n gamin' 'n be open to everyone. It takes place at th' InterContinental in downtown San Francisco on July 11-13!
armorSpecialSpringRogueNotes: Impeccably groomed. Adds <%= per %> points to Perception. Limited Edition 2014 Sprin' Gear.
armorSpecialSpringWarriorNotes: Soft as clover, strong as steel! Adds <%= con %> points to Constitution. Limited Edition 2014 Sprin' Gear.
armorSpecialSpringMageNotes: Mice be nice! Adds <%= int %> points to Intelligence. Limited Edition 2014 Sprin' Gear.
armorSpecialSpringHealerNotes: Warm 'n snuggly, but protects its owner from harm. Adds <%= con %> points to Constitution. Limited Edition 2014 Sprin' Gear.
armorSpecialSummerRogueNotes: These robes be extra cozy, yarrrr! Adds <%= per %> points to Perception. Limited Edition 2014 Summer Gear.
armorSpecialSummerWarriorNotes: Complete wit' buckle, as well as swash. Adds <%= con %> points to Constitution. Limited Edition 2014 Summer Gear.
armorSpecialSummerMageNotes: 'tis garment 'o shimmerin' scales transforms its wearer into a real Mermage! Adds <%= int %> points to Intelligence. Limited Edition 2014 Summer Gear.
armorSpecialSummerHealerNotes: 'tis garment 'o shimmerin' scales transforms its wearer into a real Seahealer! Adds <%= con %> points to Constitution. Limited Edition 2014 Summer Gear.
armorSpecialFallRogueNotes: Vivid. Velvet. Vampiric. Adds <%= per %> points to Perception. Limited Edition 2014 Autumn Gear.
armorSpecialFallWarriorNotes: Protects ye from mysterious potion spills. Adds <%= con %> points to Constitution. Limited Edition 2014 Autumn Gear.
armorSpecialFallMageNotes: 'tis robe has plenty 'o pockets to hold extra helpin's 'o eye 'o newt 'n tongue 'o frog. Adds <%= int %> points to Intelligence. Limited Edition 2014 Autumn Gear.
armorSpecialFallHealerNotes: Charge into battle pre-bandaged! Adds <%= con %> points to Constitution. Limited Edition 2014 Autumn Gear.
armorMystery201402Notes: Shimmerin' 'n strong, these robes have many pockets to carry letters.
armorMystery201403Notes: 'tis mossy armor 'o woven wood bends wit' th' movement 'o th' wearer.
armorMystery201405Notes: Nothin' can hurt ye when ye be swathed in flames!
armorMystery201406Notes: 'tis flexible robe makes it possible fer its wearer to slip through even th' tiniest cracks. June 2014 Subscriber Item.
armorMystery201407Notes: Described alternatively as "splooshy", "overly thick" 'n "frankly, kind 'o cumbersome", 'tis suit be th' best bucko 'o any intrepid undersea explorer. July 2014 Subscriber Item. Confers no benefit.
armorMystery201408Notes: These robes be woven wit' sunlight 'n gold. August 2014 Subscriber Item. Confers no benefit.
armorMystery201409Notes: A leaf-covered vest that camouflages th' wearer. SeptembARrrrr 2014 Subscriber Item. Confers no benefit.
armorMystery201410Notes: Scaly, slimy, 'n strong! October 2014 Subscriber Outfit. Confers no benefit.
headWarrior1Notes: Cap 'o sturdy boiled hide. Increases Strength by <%= str %>.
headWarrior2Notes: Hood 'o interlocked metal rin's. Increases Strength by <%= str %>.
headWarrior3Notes: Thick steel helmet, proof against any blow. Increases Strength by <%= str %>.
headWarrior4Notes: Set wit' rubies fer power, 'n glows when th' wearer be angered. Increases Strength by <%= str %>.
headWarrior5Notes: Regal crown bound to shinin' armor. Increases Strength by <%= str %>.
headRogue1Notes: Basic protective cowl. Increases Perception by <%= per %>.
headRogue2Notes: Useful fer both defense 'n disguise. Increases Perception by <%= per %>.
headRogue3Notes: Rugged, but dont impede hearin'. Increases Perception by <%= per %>.
headRogue4Notes: Grants perfect vision in darkness. Increases Perception by <%= per %>.
headRogue5Notes: Conceals even thoughts from them who would probe them. Increases Perception by <%= per %>.
headWizard1Notes: Simple, comfortable, 'n fashionable. Increases Perception by <%= per %>.
headWizard2Notes: Traditional headgear 'o th' itinerant wizard. Increases Perception by <%= per %>.
headWizard3Notes: Adorned wit' th' rin's 'o Saturn. Increases Perception by <%= per %>.
headWizard4Notes: Focuses th' mind fer intensive spellcastin'. Increases Perception by <%= per %>.
headWizard5Notes: Shows authority over fortune, the seven seas, 'n lesser mages. Increases Perception by <%= per %>.
headHealer1Notes: Jeweled headpiece, fer focus on th' task at hand. Increases Intelligence by <%= int %>.
headHealer2Notes: A taste 'o luxury fer a humble profession. Increases Intelligence by <%= int %>.
headHealer3Notes: Shines to let sufferers be knowin' their salvation be at hand. Increases Intelligence by <%= int %>.
headHealer4Notes: Emits an aura 'o life 'n growth. Increases Intelligence by <%= int %>.
headHealer5Notes: Fer kin', queen, or miracle-worker. Increases Intelligence by <%= int %>.
headSpecial0Notes: Blood 'n ash, lava 'n obsidian gift 'tis helm its imagery 'n power. Increases Intelligence by <%= int %>.
headSpecial1Notes: Th' favored crown 'o them who lead by example. Increases all attributes by <%= attrs %>.
headSpecial2Notes: A testament to them who gave 'o themselves while askin' nothin' in return. Increases Intelligence 'n Strength by <%= attrs %> each.
headSpecialNyeNotes: Ye've received an Absurd parrrty Hat! Wear it wit' pride while rin'in' in th' New Year!
headSpecialYetiNotes: Limited Edition 2013 Winter Gear! An adorably fearsome hat. Increases Strength by <%= str %>.
headSpecialSkiNotes: Limited Edition 2013 Winter Gear! Keeps th' wearer's identity secret... 'n their face toasty. Increases Perception by <%= per %>.
headSpecialCandycaneNotes: Limited Edition 2013 Winter Gear! 'tis be th' most delicious hat in th' seven seas. 'tis also known to appear 'n disappear mysteriously. Increases Perception by <%= per %>.
headSpecialSnowflakeNotes: Limited Edition 2013 Winter Gear! th' wearer 'o 'tis crown be never cold. Increases Intelligence by <%= int %>.
headSpecialSpringRogueNotes: Nobody gunna EVER guess that ye be a sea monster burglar! Adds <%= per %> points to Perception. Limited Edition 2014 Sprin' Gear.
headSpecialSpringWarriorNotes: Welded from sweet meadow clover, 'tis helmet can resist even th' mightiest blow. Adds <%= str %> points to Strength. Limited Edition 2014 Sprin' Gear.
headSpecialSpringMageNotes: 'tis hat stores lots 'o powerful magic! give a go' not to nibble it. Adds <%= per %> points to Perception. Limited Edition 2014 Sprin' Gear.
headSpecialSpringHealerNotes: 'tis crown symbolizes loyalty 'n companionship. A sea monster be an adventurer's best bucko, after all! Adds <%= int %> points to Intelligence. Limited Edition 2014 Sprin' Gear.
headSpecialSummerRogueNotes: Only th' most productive 'o band 'o pirates can wear 'tis fine hat. Adds <%= per %> points to Perception. Limited Edition 2014 Summer Gear.
headSpecialSummerWarriorNotes: 'tis soft, salty cloth fills its wearer wit' strength. Adds <%= str %> points to Strength. Limited Edition 2014 Summer Gear.
headSpecialSummerMageNotes: What could be more magical than a hat wrapped in seaweed? Adds <%= per %> points to Perception. Limited Edition 2014 Summer Gear.
headSpecialSummerHealerNotes: Enables its wearer to heal damaged reefs. Adds <%= int %> points to Intelligence. Limited Edition 2014 Summer Gear.
headSpecialFallRogueNotes: A Vampire Smiter's identity must always be hidden. Adds <%= per %> points to Perception. Limited Edition 2014 Autumn Gear.
headSpecialFallWarriorNotes: Graft on 'tis helm! 'tis only SLIGHTLY used. Adds <%= str %> points to Strength. Limited Edition 2014 Autumn Gear.
headSpecialFallMageNotes: Magic be woven into every thread 'o 'tis hat. Adds <%= per %> points to Perception. Limited Edition 2014 Autumn Gear.
headSpecialFallHealerNotes: Highly sanitary 'n extra fashionable. Adds <%= int %> points to Intelligence. Limited Edition 2014 Autumn Gear.
headSpecialGaymerxNotes: (Confers no benefit) In celebration 'o pride season 'n GaymerX, 'tis special helmet be decorated wit' a radiant, colorful rainbow pattern! GaymerX be a game convention celebratin' LGBTQ 'n gamin' 'n be open to everyone. It takes place at th' InterContinental in downtown San Francisco on July 11-13!
headMystery201402Notes: 'tis win'ed circlet imbues th' wearer wit' th' speed 'o th' wind!
headMystery201406Notes: Th' tentacles 'o 'tis helm gather up magical energy from th' rum. June 2014 Subscriber Item.
headMystery201407Notes: 'tis helm makes it easy to explore underwater! It sort 'o makes ye look like a googly-eyed fish, too. extra retro! July 2014 Subscriber Item. Confers no benefit.
headMystery201408Notes: 'tis blazin' crown gives its wearer great strength 'o gunna. August 2014 Subscriber Item. Confers no benefit.
shieldWarrior1Notes: Round shield 'o thick wood. Increases Constitution by <%= con %>.
shieldWarrior2Notes: Light 'n sturdy, quick to brin' to th' defense. Increases Constitution by <%= con %>.
shieldWarrior3Notes: Made 'o wood but bolstered wit' metal bands. Increases Constitution by <%= con %>.
shieldWarrior4Notes: Rebukes blows wit' a burst 'o flame. Increases Constitution by <%= con %>.
shieldWarrior5Notes: Shinin' badge 'o th' vanguard. Increases Constitution by <%= con %>.
shieldHealer1Notes: Easy to disengage, freein' a hand fer bandagin'. Increases Constitution by <%= con %>.
shieldHealer2Notes: Tapered shield wit' th' symbol 'o healin'. Increases Constitution by <%= con %>.
shieldHealer3Notes: Traditional shield 'o defender knights. Increases Constitution by <%= con %>.
shieldHealer4Notes: Stops blows aimed at broadside innocents as well as them aimed at ye. Increases Constitution by <%= con %>.
shieldHealer5Notes: Bestowed upon them most dedicated to th' kin'dom's defense. Increases Constitution by <%= con %>.
shieldSpecial0Notes: Sees beyond th' veil 'o Davy Jones', 'n displays what it finds thar fer enemies to fear. Increases Perception by <%= per %>.
shieldSpecial1Notes: Shatters arrows 'n deflects th' words 'o naysayers. Increases all attributes by <%= attrs %>.
shieldSpecialYetiNotes: Limited Edition 2013 Winter Gear! 'tis shield reflects light from th' snow. Increases Constitution by <%= con %>.
shieldSpecialSnowflakeNotes: Limited Edition 2013 Winter Gear! Every shield be unique. Increases Constitution by <%= con %>.
shieldSpecialSpringRogueNotes: Great fer scalin' tall buildin's, 'n also fer shreddin' carpets. Adds <%= str %> points to Strength. Limited Edition 2014 Sprin' Gear.
shieldSpecialSpringWarriorNotes: 'tis shield never cracks, no matter how harrrd ye hit it! Adds <%= con %> points to Constitution. Limited Edition 2014 Sprin' Gear.
shieldSpecialSpringHealerNotes: Lets out an obnoxious, continuous squeak when bitten, drivin' enemies away. Adds <%= con %> points to Constitution. Limited Edition 2014 Sprin' Gear.
shieldSpecialSummerRogueNotes: Avast! ye'll make them Dailies swim th' plank! Adds <%= str %> points to Strength. Limited Edition 2014 Summer Gear.
shieldSpecialSummerWarriorNotes: 'tis shield, made from th' wood 'o wrecked ships, can deter even th' stormiest Dailies. Adds <%= con %> points to Constitution. Limited Edition 2014 Summer Gear.
shieldSpecialSummerHealerNotes: No one gunna dare to attack th' coral reef when faced wit' 'tis shiny shield! Adds <%= con %> points to Constitution. Limited Edition 2014 Summer Gear.
shieldSpecialFallRogueNotes: Dispatches undead. Also grants a bonus against werewolves, because ye can never be too careful. Adds <%= str %> points to Strength. Limited Edition 2014 Autumn Gear.
shieldSpecialFallWarriorNotes: Spills mysteriously on lab coats. Adds <%= con %> points to Constitution. Limited Edition 2014 Autumn Gear.
shieldSpecialFallHealerNotes: 'tis glittery shield was found in an ancient tomb. Adds <%= con %> points to Constitution. Limited Edition 2014 Autumn Gear.
backMystery201402Notes: These shinin' win's have feathers that glitter in th' sun!
backMystery201410Notes: Swoop through th' nightfall on these strong wings. October 2014 Subscriber Outfit.
backSpecialWonderconRedNotes: Swishes wit' strength 'n beauty. Special edition convention armor.
backSpecialWonderconBlackNotes: Spun 'o shadows 'n whispers. Special edition convention armor.
bodySpecialWonderconRedNotes: An comely ruby collar! Special edition convention armor.
bodySpecialWonderconGoldNotes: An comely gold collar! Special edition convention armor.
bodySpecialWonderconBlackNotes: An comely ebony collar! Special edition convention armor.
bodySpecialSummerMageNotes: Neither salt rum nor fresh water can tarnish 'tis metallic capelet. Confers no stat bonus. Limited Edition 2014 Summer Gear.
bodySpecialSummerHealerNotes: A stylish collar 'o live coral! Confers no benefit. Limited Edition 2014 Summer Gear.
headAccessorySpecialSpringRogueNotes: These feline ears twitch to detect incomin' threats. Confers no stat bonus. Limited Edition 2014 Sprin' Gear.
headAccessorySpecialSpringWarriorNotes: Bunny ears that keenly detect every crunch 'o a carrot. Confers no stat bonus. Limited Edition 2014 Sprin' Gear.
headAccessorySpecialSpringMageNotes: These round mouse ears be silky-soft. Confers no stat bonus. Limited Edition 2014 Sprin' Gear.
headAccessorySpecialSpringHealerNotes: Floppy but cute. Wanna play? Confers no stat bonus. Limited Edition 2014 Spring Gear.
headAccessorySpecialSummerRogueNotes: It dont take a son of a biscuit to spy wit' ye eye how stylish 'tis be! Confers no stat bonus. Limited Edition 2014 Summer Gear.
headAccessorySpecialSummerWarriorNotes: It dont take a rapscallion to spy wit' ye eye how stylish 'tis be! Confers no stat bonus. Limited Edition 2014 Summer Gear.
headAccessorySpecialWonderconRedNotes: What a powerful face accessory! Special edition convention armor.
headAccessorySpecialWonderconBlackNotes: Ye motives be definitely legitimate. Special edition convention armor.
headAccessoryMystery201403Notes: These antlers shimmer wit' moss 'n lichen.
headAccessoryMystery201404Notes: These antennae help th' wearer sense dangerous distractions!
headAccessoryMystery201409Notes: These powerful antlers change colors wit' th' leaves.
